analysis.description:
Pinakion.balances (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#95-96) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#192-230)
	- balanceOfAt (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#302-325)
	- generateTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#396-410)
	- destroyTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#414-431)
Pinakion.isContract (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#496-500) is declared view but contains assembly code

BlockHashRNGFallback.saveRN (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#684-704) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- _block < block.number && randomNumber[_block] == 0

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1051-1070):
	External calls:
	- rng.requestRN(rnBlock) (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1055-1056)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1056)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1051-1070):
	External calls:
	- randomNumber = rng.getUncorrelatedRN(rnBlock) (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1058)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- period (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1058-1060)

Reentrancy in Kleros.passPeriod (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1051-1070):

	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lastPeriodChange (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1069)

Pinakion.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#527-542) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#538-540)

Pinakion.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#463) shadows:

	External calls:

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(pinakion.transferFrom(_from,this,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x211f01e59b425253c0a0e9a7bf612605b42ce82c.sol#1019-1020)
